transcript.text: Debbie is surprised at Kim’s photo. Would you have done what Kim has done? Select one option and then submit your answer.

contentText.text: What’s wrong with taking a photo of yourself at work and posting it to social media?

instructionText.text: Select one option and then submit.
Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to continue.

optionContent.option: Nothing, if it’s sent to a site that deletes the post after it’s been viewed
It depends on whom you send it to
It could be a problem as there may be confidential information in the background

correct.text: We need to protect sensitive customer information such as billing and payment information. Our company has a legal obligation to protect customer data and process it in accordance with the law. If we don’t do this, we can be heavily fined.
Even if there is no any intention to make sensitive information available, doing so can be extremely harmful to the individual as well as the company.
